_source.short_desc: An easy invoicing and accounting solution starting at $7.50/mth (first 4 mths). Join 24 million people who've already used FreshBooks.
_source.long_desc: FreshBooks makes small business invoicing and billing so simple, you'll be amazed at the time you have to focus on doing what you love and how much faster you get paid. Who would have thought invoice software could do that? Try it free for 30 days, no credit card required.
_source.pricing_details:
Lite: $4.50/month - 5 clients

Plus: $7.50/month - 50 clients

Premium: $15.00/month - unlimited clients

Custom pricing is available for unlimited clients and specialized features.
_source.target_audience: FreshBooks is cloud based accounting designed exclusively for the self employed. Spend less time on frustrating paperwork and more time doing the work that gets you paid!

category_features.name: Billing Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can view past bills and pay current invoices

category_features.name: Contact Database
category_features.definition: Centralized database of an organization's customers and clients

category_features.name: Contingency Billing
category_features.definition: Business model where clients pay their lawyer a fee only if the case is won/settled successfully

category_features.name: Customizable Invoices
category_features.definition: Brand invoices with organization's logo

category_features.name: Dunning Management
category_features.definition: Process of automatically notifying clients when payments fail to ensure invoices are paid

category_features.name: Hourly Billing
category_features.definition: Business model that charges based on the amount of time spent

category_features.name: Mobile Payments
category_features.definition: Clients can submit payments via mobile devices

category_features.name: Multi-Currency
category_features.definition: Manage and handle various international currencies

category_features.name: Online Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create, send, and view electronic invoices

category_features.name: Online Payments
category_features.definition: Payment webpage where clients can pay bills

category_features.name: Payment Processing
category_features.definition: Accept, record, and reconcile financial transactions

category_features.name: Project Billing
category_features.definition: Business model that bills clients an amount based on the project/task/job performed

category_features.name: Recurring/Subscription Billing
category_features.definition: Business model that bills clients repeatedly based on set amount of time

category_features.name: Tax Calculation
category_features.definition: Location based taxes

category_features.name: Accounts Receivable
category_features.definition: Track outstanding invoices and the money owed from clients

category_features.name: Bank Reconciliation
category_features.definition: Compare and match accounting/financial records with corresponding bank statements

category_features.name: Billing & Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create and manage monetary interactions between parties (ie. bills and invoices)

category_features.name: CPA Firms
category_features.definition: Software specialized for certified public accountants (financial advisors) who help outside entities reach financial goals

category_features.name: Expense Tracking
category_features.definition: Detailed log and record of costs

category_features.name: Fixed Asset Management
category_features.definition: Centralized database to track details of fixed assets (property/plant/equipment) such as depreciation & maintenance scheduling/history

category_features.name: For Government
category_features.definition: Software specialized governmental agencies or organizations who deal with governmental agencies

category_features.name: Fund Accounting
category_features.definition: Manage revenue acquired through grants, donations, and other sources (accountability vs. profitability)

category_features.name: Nonprofits
category_features.definition: Software specialized for non-profit organizations

category_features.name: Payroll Management
category_features.definition: Track and process employee payroll (salaries, wages, etc.)

category_features.name: Project Accounting
category_features.definition: Manage and track financials on a project-to-project basis

category_features.name: Purchase Order Management
category_features.definition: Detailed log of all items purchased during a project to manage and track expenses

category_features.name: Tax Management
category_features.definition: Track tax-related transactions and ensure compliance

category_features.name: Approval Process Control
category_features.definition: Streamline and manage the process of granting permission to the correct parties throughout task progression

category_features.name: Corporate Card
category_features.definition: Manage and track credit cards that are distributed to employees to use for authorized business expenses

category_features.name: Mobile Receipt Upload
category_features.definition: Scan and upload receipts to a central database using a mobile device

category_features.name: Multi-Currency
category_features.definition: Manage and handle various international currencies

category_features.name: Receipt Management
category_features.definition: Upload, track, and submit receipts in a central database

category_features.name: Reimbursement Management
category_features.definition: Manage compensation for out-of-pocket expenses incurred by an employee, client or another party

category_features.name: Spend Control
category_features.definition: Set allowances and ensure employees don't spend more than the allotted amounts

category_features.name: Time & Expense Tracking
category_features.definition: Measure time to completion or hours worked

category_features.name: Workflow Management
category_features.definition: Create, design, and automate processes within the software

category_features.name: Deferred Billing
category_features.definition: Buyer isn't billed until the period is up without any interest charges

category_features.name: Dunning Management
category_features.definition: Process of automatically notifying clients when payments fail to ensure invoices are paid

category_features.name: Multi-Currency
category_features.definition: Manage and handle various international currencies

category_features.name: Multi-Period Recurring Billing
category_features.definition: Set recurrence time frame and corresponding rates i.e. monthly, semi-annually or annually

category_features.name: Payment Processing
category_features.definition: Accept, record, and reconcile financial transactions

category_features.name: Recurring Invoicing
category_features.definition: Generate recurring invoices

category_features.name: Recurring/Subscription Billing
category_features.definition: Business model that bills clients repeatedly based on set amount of time

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Automatic Time Capture
category_features.definition: Automate recording of time to reduce human error

category_features.name: Billable & Non-Billable Hours
category_features.definition: Track billable hours and/or non billable expenses related to work performed

category_features.name: Billing & Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create and manage monetary interactions between parties (ie. bills and invoices)

category_features.name: Employee Database
category_features.definition: Electronic storage of staff contact information and job status

category_features.name: Mobile Time Tracking
category_features.definition: Track the time and location worked by employees via mobile device

category_features.name: Multiple Billing Rates
category_features.definition: Different tiers of pricing and billing for different employees and situations

category_features.name: Offline Time Tracking
category_features.definition: Track employee and task times without internet connection

category_features.name: Overtime Calculation
category_features.definition: Manage and record overtime hours for hourly employees

category_features.name: Timesheet Management
category_features.definition: Track the amount of time spent on a job or task

category_features.name: Vacation/Leave Tracking
category_features.definition: Request, track, and manage time off requests and vacation time

category_features.definition: Monitor and track project related activities based on various metrics

infographics.infographic_title: The Top 20 Most User Friendly Accounting Software Report

related_products.short_desc: The leading accounting software for small businesses. Instant access to customer, vendor and employee information.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Enterprise (Save Up to 40%) is an end-to-end accounting software that can grow with your business. It provides all the tools your business needs, yet is easy to use. You can organize your books, manage inventory, track sales, and even run payroll, but at the fraction of the cost. With QuickBooks Enterprise, you save thousands of dollars a year vs. comparable solutions. Powerful and flexible, it also comes in editions designed to fit your specific needs. Take a free test drive today.

related_products.short_desc: QuickBooks Online is a small business accounting software and app that allows you to manage your business anywhere, anytime.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Invoicing Software makes it easy to create & customize your invoices. It's easy to add your company logo, modify colors, select fonts, and choose the items that will appear on your invoices. Email online invoices directly to your customers, you can even schedule invoices to be automatically generated and sent to the customers that you bill regularly. QuickBooks is the world's #1 accounting solution, with over 4.8 million users worldwide. Try QuickBooks Online for Free Today!

related_products.short_desc: Manage your bills & invoices with Xero. Reduce admin time, pay your bills on time and make sure you get paid within your payment terms.
related_products.features: With Xero it's easy to take care of your bills and to invoice your customers. Easily understand and manage your cash flow, get a view of what bills are due for payment and which of your invoices are outstanding or paid. Schedule payments, batch pay suppliers and spend less time on business admin by paying multiple bills in one simple transaction. You'll avoid late fees and build good relationships with your suppliers by paying your bills on time.

related_products.short_desc: Accounting tool that provides multi-monitor support and past due stamps through improved cash flow.
related_products.features: Accounting tool that provides multi-monitor support and past due stamps through improved cash flow.

related_products.short_desc: Hubstaff has trusted time tracking and employee monitoring for remote and field teams. Scheduling, invoicing, billing, payroll, more.
related_products.features: Fight inefficiency and work better with streamlined time tracking from Hubstaff. Track time through simple desktop, web, and mobile apps, then manage invoicing, billing, and more through one dashboard. Hubstaff integrates with over 30 apps so your business can run more efficiently, including Jira, Asana, Github, Slack, and Paypal. See work happen in real-time, track location with GPS and geofences, identify roadblocks and keep moving forward. Available for Mac, Windows, Linux, iOS & Android.

related_products.short_desc: See everything about your customers in one place, such as payment details, life-time value, overall customer ranking, CRM, and more.
related_products.features: Send invoices with ease. Create and send online invoices and estimates in minutes. Get paid in one click 24/7 from any device. Keep track of the status of all your invoices in real time from one place.

related_products.short_desc: Optimize receivables and accelerate cash flow by automating billing and invoicing processes with NetSuite's cloud accounting software.
related_products.features: With NetSuite, easily and quickly generate and send invoices.  Automatically convert sales orders to invoices as orders are fulfilled. Customizable invoice templates let you meet customers' unique billing needs.  Consolidate invoices when multiple orders are placed within a single billing period. Transactions are posted to the GL automatically, which saves time, helps avoid error-prone manual data entry, and ensures AR data is always up to date. Easily manage recurring subscription billing.

related_products.short_desc: Optimize receivables and accelerate cash flow by automating billing and invoicing processes with NetSuite's cloud accounting software.
related_products.features: With NetSuite, easily and quickly generate and send invoices.  Automatically convert sales orders to invoices as orders are fulfilled. Customizable invoice templates let you meet customers' unique billing needs.  Consolidate invoices when multiple orders are placed within a single billing period. Transactions are posted to the GL automatically, which saves time, helps avoid error-prone manual data entry, and ensures AR data is always up to date. Easily manage recurring subscription billing.

related_products.short_desc: Eliminate the frustrations and errors of traditional invoicing software by taking advantage of PandaDoc sales invoice software.
related_products.features: PandaDoc is easy-to-use cloud software for companies of all sizes and business needs. There is one dashboard to create, customize, eSign, and send invoices quickly. The intuitive and user-friendly interface helps you to save tons of time and close deals faster. PandaDoc is the best tool for all of your client-facing documents including contracts, proposals, and quotes. With iOS and Android apps, stay in touch and keep your business moving forward from anywhere.

related_products.short_desc: QuickBooks is an end-to-end accounting software that can grow with your business.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Online Advanced (Save 50%) is a cloud-based, all-in-one, accounting and business hub solution, designed for growing, small to mid-sized businesses. Get performance reporting with highly customizable tracking tools, automated workflows, and real-time revenue and cash flow management dashboards. Seamlessly integrate best-in-class Premium Apps like Salesforce and HubSpot (CRM), Bill.com (accounts payable), DocuSign, LeanLaw & more to expand your capabilities as your business needs grow.

similar_products.short_desc: Optimize receivables and accelerate cash flow by automating billing and invoicing processes with NetSuite's cloud accounting software.
similar_products.features: With NetSuite, easily and quickly generate and send invoices.  Automatically convert sales orders to invoices as orders are fulfilled. Customizable invoice templates let you meet customers' unique billing needs.  Consolidate invoices when multiple orders are placed within a single billing period. Transactions are posted to the GL automatically, which saves time, helps avoid error-prone manual data entry, and ensures AR data is always up to date. Easily manage recurring subscription billing.

similar_products.short_desc: Improve budgeting, project oversight, team communication, task management, resource management, invoicing, and project financials.
similar_products.features: Time is money. Use BigTime to save both. BigTime is the only time, billing, and expense tracking and payment platform that protects your time like your wallet depends on it. Seriously, it takes fewer clicks to accomplish any task. BigTime gives you the tools you need to deliver billable work on time and on budget, giving our customers an average improvement of 25% in gross margins and a substantial increase in expansion and referral revenue. Sign up for a free trial today!

similar_products.short_desc: Bill.com is the intelligent business payments platform that delivers financial process efficiency, time savings, and full control.
similar_products.features: Bill.com delivers financial process efficiency through streamlined accounts payable (AP) and accounts receivable (AR) management. Reduce errors and increase efficiency by leveraging artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning. Bill.com gets more intelligent as you use it, learning your processes and preferences to give you greater control over every aspect of bill management.

similar_products.short_desc: New realities call for new solutions. We are the #1 time and billing, and payments software for law firms. Try for FREE now.
similar_products.features: At HALF THE COST of other solutions, TimeSolv provides the robust time and billing needs companies demand without the extra features you never use. For over 20 years, our web-based solution has helped companies increase their billable time and get paid faster, whether at home or in the office. Integrate with QuickBooks, Office 365 and more. Try for FREE now and learn why tens of thousands of professionals have made the switch.

similar_products.short_desc: Fusebill offers flexible subscription billing and invoicing software that allows businesses to scale through every stage of growth.
similar_products.features:
Automate billing and invoicing like hundreds of our clients in SaaS, IoT, media, and more. Eliminate manual billing. Reduce revenue leaks and churn. 

Fusebill simplifies all aspects of subscription billing and management, automating recurring invoicing, payments, and revenue recognition while streamlining customer lifecycle management to maximize revenue. Fusebill's flexible ledger-based platform allows you to scale your business with absolute confidence.

similar_products.short_desc: ZarMoney does it all... And does it better! We believe an outside-the-box accounting solution should have out-of-this-world support.
similar_products.features:
ZarMoney is a Cloud-Based Accounting Software for all types of businesses. Features include invoicing, inventory tracking, quotes, estimates, statements, alerts and so much more...

Some Benefits Include:
*No more costly monthly charges for accounting software.
*Save more time and be more productive with ZarMoney.
*Track all your business and profits in one place.
*Business software support  

Get started now! No credit card required to get full FREE Access.

similar_products.short_desc: Practice management for accountants with expense tracking, staff time reporting, cash receipts handling, and client management tools.
similar_products.features: Time and billing software that offers expense tracking, staff time reporting, cash receipts handling, and client management tools.

similar_products.short_desc: Eliminate the frustrations and errors of traditional invoicing software by taking advantage of PandaDoc sales invoice software.
similar_products.features: PandaDoc is easy-to-use cloud software for companies of all sizes and business needs. There is one dashboard to create, customize, eSign, and send invoices quickly. The intuitive and user-friendly interface helps you to save tons of time and close deals faster. PandaDoc is the best tool for all of your client-facing documents including contracts, proposals, and quotes. With iOS and Android apps, stay in touch and keep your business moving forward from anywhere.

similar_products.short_desc:
Everything you need to run your business: proposals, contracts, invoicing, payments, and more. 

Use code "ONLY1" to start for $1/mo.
similar_products.features:
Billing and invoicing software for independent professionals-that's HoneyBook.

HoneyBook makes it easy to book more clients, manage projects, and get paid all in one place.

With proposals, invoices, contracts, payments, and scheduling at your fingertips, you have everything you need to give clients a great experience.

Get your first 6 months for just $1/mo with code "ONLY1".

similar_products.short_desc: Payference is the all-in-one tool for real-time, dynamic cash forecasting. Take the guesswork out of cash management.
similar_products.features:
Take the guesswork out of cash management. Manage your entire cash flow and working capital options with Payference. Improve cash flow with speedier collections and better forecasting in one easy to use solution. 

Plus, we have seamless integrations with your ERP/accounting system, banks and payment channels, giving you a wholistic view of your cash on hand in real-time. Want to learn more? Visit www.payference.com.

similar_products.short_desc: All your purchases, one weekly or monthly invoice with perfectly-coded spend data-paid on your terms. It's that simple.
similar_products.features: Bring Order to your invoice management. Pay 1 weekly or monthly invoice for all your purchases instead of paying each vendor individually, or automatically schedule payments to vendors regardless of their accepted payment method. Ensure accuracy with 3-way matching and receive perfectly coded invoices with line level detail that can be easily exported into accounting or ERP systems. The cherry on top-peace of mind knowing you can quickly find any invoice or payment made through Order.

similar_products.short_desc: SubscriptionFlow is automated subscription management & payment processing platform for businesses to manage recurring billing/payments
similar_products.features: SubscriptionFlow is a highly customizable and extendable SaaS subscription management system that offer innovative tools to reduce churn, increase customer acquisition & retention rates, & curb revenue losses. It is an all-inclusive automated subscription billing and payment processing platform equipped with robust features for handling subscriptions, managing subscribers, proration, dunning, billing & tax mgmt., integrations, pricing optimization, payment processing,

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Accounting software automates an organization's financial functions and transactions with modules including accounts payable, accounts receivable, payroll, billing and general ledger. Integration of Accounting applications allows for comprehensive, real-time, on-demand analysis of an organization's financial status. Toolsets within Accounting solutions can often be customized to the specific needs of an organization. Accounting software is related to Audit software, Billing and Invoicing software, Compliance software and Financial Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Accounts Receivable software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Accounts Receivable tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Accounts Receivable software deals with money that is owed to an organization. It automates the recording of payments on outstanding invoices and provides reports on collection and aging. Along with reports, Accounts Receivable applications generate monthly customer statements and collection letters. Accounts Receivable solutions integrate with Accounting software. Accounts Receivable software is related to Accounting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Debt Collection software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Debt Collection tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Debt Collection software automates the management and accounting process for overdue invoices on behalf of an organization or a specialized collection agency. Debt Collection applications can integrate with existing accounting and invoicing systems. Debt Collection software is related to Accounting software, Banking Systems software and Billing and Invoicing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Expense Report software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Expense Report tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Expense Report software assists organizations in keeping track of their business and travel expenses. These applications allow employees to submit records of their expenditures. For smaller businesses, spreadsheet-generating software creates reports to allow for better budgeting. Expense Report software is related to Budgeting software, Financial Reporting software and Time and Expense software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Legal Billing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Billing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Legal Billing software automates time tracking, billing, calendaring and accounting for law practices. These applications facilitate legal-style hourly billing and recording of case-related expenses. Many Legal Billing solutions also feature integration for a broad range of case and workflow management tools as well as accounting and payroll features across multiple office locations. Legal Billing software is related to Law Practice Management software, Professional Services Automation software and Time and Expense software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Medical Billing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Medical Billing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Billing software manages patient billing and collections for the medical industry. Hospitals, clinics, and doctors offices use these applications to centralize and automate essential business processes including: accounts receivable, payment processing, patient data sharing, document management, electronic claims, collections, and financial reporting. Medical Billing solutions typically allow for the tracking of patient demographics, background data, and insurance information. Medical Billing software is related to Chiropractic software, Claims Processing software, Dental software, Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Lab software, Medical Practice Management software and Medical Scheduling software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Time and Expense software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Time and Expense tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Time and Expense software automates the tracking of billable hours and reimbursement expenses. Time and Expense solutions can be used by organizations in professional services industries to monitor projects on a task and overall basis as well as billing rates so that the appropriate amount may be invoiced. Time and Expense applications can also be used for expense reporting by employees who travel frequently. Time and Expense software is related to Professional Services Automation software, Project Management software, Time Clock software and Workforce Management software.

_source.short_desc: An easy invoicing and accounting solution starting at $7.50/mth (first 4 mths). Join 24 million people who've already used FreshBooks.
_source.long_desc: FreshBooks automates daily accounting activities namely invoice creation, payment acceptance, expenses tracking, billable time tracking and financial reporting. Try it free for 30 days, no credit card required.
_source.pricing_details:
Lite: $4.50/month - 5 clients

Plus: $7.50/month - 50 clients

Premium: $15.00/month - unlimited clients

Custom pricing is available for unlimited clients and specialized features.
_source.target_audience: FreshBooks is cloud based accounting designed exclusively for the self employed. Spend less time on frustrating paperwork and more time doing the work that gets you paid!

category_features.name: 1099 Preparation
category_features.definition: Create and distribute 1099 tax forms to suppliers

category_features.name: Aging Tracking
category_features.definition: Pull a report on unpaid invoices that shows how much time has elapsed since the date of the invoice

category_features.name: Approval Process Control
category_features.definition: Streamline and manage the process of granting permission to the correct parties throughout task progression

category_features.name: Cash Management
category_features.definition: Collection, handling, management and usage of an organization's funds

category_features.name: Check Writing
category_features.definition: Issue payments to third parties via checks

category_features.name: Data Extraction
category_features.definition: Automatically extract information from documents or websites and input it into a database in a specified format

category_features.name: Duplicate Payment Alert
category_features.definition: Receive an automatic notification when the same exact payment is about to be initiated for the second time

category_features.name: Electronic Funds Transfer
category_features.definition: Transfer money electronically between two bank accounts

category_features.name: Fraud Detection
category_features.definition: Identify and prevent suspicious activity

category_features.name: Invoice Processing
category_features.definition: Create, process, execute and manage suppliers invoices till the payment is made

category_features.name: PO Reconciliation
category_features.definition: Verify that invoices comply to the terms of pre-issued purchase orders prior to issuing payments

category_features.name: Recurring Payments
category_features.definition: Automate supplier payments on a predetermined schedule (monthly, quarterly, etc)

category_features.name: Vendor Management
category_features.definition: Ability to track and store all vendor-related information, such as contacts, services offered, terms, etc.

category_features.name: ACH Payment Processing
category_features.definition: Receive credits and send direct debits through automated clearing house electronic network

category_features.name: Aging Tracking
category_features.definition: Pull a report on unpaid invoices that shows how much time has elapsed since the date of the invoice

category_features.name: Billing & Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create and manage monetary interactions between parties (ie. bills and invoices)

category_features.name: Check Processing
category_features.definition: Receive and deposit or issue and record check payments

category_features.name: Customer Statements
category_features.definition: Reports that show customers their invoices, payments, and balance on the account

category_features.name: Online Payments
category_features.definition: Accept and process customer payments from an online portal, such as your website, app, or email

category_features.name: Overpayment Processing
category_features.definition: Flag a transaction when a customer pays more than they owe and either refund the overpayment or save the overpayment as a credit

category_features.name: Partial Payments
category_features.definition: Allow customers to make a partial payment on an invoice and track remaining debt

category_features.name: Payment Collection
category_features.definition: Track and manage customer payments that are overdue

category_features.name: Receivables Ledger
category_features.definition: A list of customers and their payments due updated on a monthly basis

category_features.name: Recurring/Subscription Billing
category_features.definition: Automate customer payments on a predetermined schedule (monthly, quarterly, etc)

category_features.name: Billing & Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create and manage monetary interactions between parties (ie. bills and invoices)

category_features.name: Payroll Management
category_features.definition: Track and process employee payroll (salaries, wages, etc.)

category_features.name: "What If" Scenarios
category_features.definition: A type of technique planning that allows businesses to input variables to forecast potential outcomes

category_features.name: Access Controls/Permissions
category_features.definition: Define levels of authorization for access to specific files/folders

category_features.name: Audit Trail
category_features.definition: Track changes and view date/time records

category_features.name: Budgeting/Forecasting
category_features.definition: Track actual spending to ensure it's in line with the budget and estimate future finances

category_features.name: Cash Management
category_features.definition: The collection, handling, management and usage of an organization's funds

category_features.name: Consolidation/Roll-Up
category_features.definition: Combine and merge loans, assets, liabilities, and other financial data and items into one entity for reporting purposes

category_features.name: Data Import/Export
category_features.definition: Import and export information and reports to and from the program

category_features.name: General Ledger
category_features.definition: Centralized accounting record which tracks all financial transactions

category_features.name: Income & Balance Sheet
category_features.definition: A statement detailing the financial position of a business including assets, liabilities, and equity at a certain point in time

category_features.name: Multi-Company
category_features.definition: Manage the accounting and financial aspects of multiple locations or companies in a single location

category_features.name: Profit/Loss Statement
category_features.definition: A type of financial statement used to record and report an organization?s revenues, costs, and expenses over a specific amount of time

category_features.name: Accounting
category_features.definition: Built-in accounting or integration with a third party accounting system

category_features.name: Automatic Billing
category_features.definition: Setup and send recurring or automated bills

category_features.name: Calendar Management
category_features.definition: Create, manage, and share multiple calendars

category_features.name: Case Management
category_features.definition: Work on a set of tasks related to a particular charge, patient, legal issue or any other complex entity or process

category_features.name: Client Portal
category_features.definition: A website and login for stakeholders to access information

category_features.name: Document Management
category_features.definition: Collect, upload, store, and share all documents in a centralized location making it easier for everyone involved to access information

category_features.name: Expense Tracking
category_features.definition: Detailed log and record of costs

category_features.name: Time Tracking
category_features.definition: Measure time to completion or hours worked

category_features.name: Billing & Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create and manage monetary interactions between parties (ie. bills and invoices)

category_features.name: CRM
category_features.definition: Contact and lead management to track interactions and notes about clients and prospects

category_features.name: Client Portal
category_features.definition: A website and login for stakeholders to access information

category_features.name: Collaboration Tools
category_features.definition: Provides a channel for team members to share media files, communicate, and work together

category_features.name: Document Management
category_features.definition: Collect, upload, store, and share all documents in a centralized location making it easier for everyone involved to access information

category_features.name: Project Management
category_features.definition: Plan and coordinate all the resources, costs and time needed to execute assignments

category_features.name: Time & Expense Tracking
category_features.definition: Log and record hours worked and costs spent to assist in billing and invoicing

related_products.short_desc: The leading accounting software for small businesses. Instant access to customer, vendor and employee information.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Enterprise (Save Up to 40%) is an end-to-end accounting software that can grow with your business. It provides all the tools your business needs, yet is easy to use. You can organize your books, manage inventory, track sales, and even run payroll, but at the fraction of the cost. With QuickBooks Enterprise, you save thousands of dollars a year vs. comparable solutions. Powerful and flexible, it also comes in editions designed to fit your specific needs. Take a free test drive today.

related_products.short_desc: The leading accounting software for small businesses. Instant access to customer, vendor and employee information.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Enterprise (Save Up to 40%) is an end-to-end accounting software that can grow with your business. It provides all the tools your business needs, yet is easy to use. You can organize your books, manage inventory, track sales, and even run payroll, but at the fraction of the cost. With QuickBooks Enterprise, you save thousands of dollars a year vs. comparable solutions. Powerful and flexible, it also comes in editions designed to fit your specific needs. Take a free test drive today.

related_products.short_desc: Manage your bills with Xero. Reduce admin time, pay your bills on time and get an overview of where your business is spending money.
related_products.features: Billing made easy with Xero. Xero helps you easily understand and manage your cash flow and shows you what bills are due for payment. Schedule payments, batch pay suppliers and spend less time on business admin by paying multiple bills in one simple transaction. You'll avoid late fees and build good relationships with your suppliers by paying your bills on time. Keep all of your bills in one place by emailing bills and documents straight to your files inbox in Xero for paperless record-keeping.

related_products.short_desc: SAP Concur takes you beyond automation to a completely connected spend management solution that grows with your business
related_products.features: SAP Concur Invoice takes companies of all sizes and stages beyond automation to a completely connected spend management solution encompassing travel, expense, vendor invoice, compliance and risk. Our global expertise, industry-leading innovation and dynamic ecosystem of diverse partners and applications unlock powerful insights that help businesses reduce complexity and see spending clearly, so they can manage it proactively.

related_products.short_desc: Accounting tool that provides multi-monitor support and past due stamps through improved cash flow.
related_products.features: Accounting tool that provides multi-monitor support and past due stamps through improved cash flow.

related_products.short_desc: Streamline the processes to review, approve and pay invoices with NetSuite's cloud accounting software.
related_products.features: NetSuite cloud accounting software automates the processing and payment of supplier invoices. Processes such as transaction matching, journal entries, approvals, and reconciliations are automated which means manual data entry is eliminated, and the time and effort required to process bills are minimized.  AP-specific dashboards, reports, and KPIs put you in control of your company's accounts payable process.

related_products.short_desc: Fully integrated app offers up bank synchronization, automated invoices, recurring billing management, reconciliations, and more.
related_products.features: Odoo Accounting helps users easily manage their daily accounting. They offer a global view of the state of their business, as well as a list view, which offers greater visibility on document statuses and next activities. This fully integrated app has in-depth reports and financial tools, such as double-entry bookkeeping, accounts receivable & payable, multi-currency management, tax calculation, unrealized gains & losses, automatic bank feed import, accrual & cash basis methods, and more.

related_products.short_desc: Bill.com is the intelligent business payments platform that delivers financial process efficiency, time savings, and full control.
related_products.features: Bill.com delivers financial process efficiency through streamlined accounts payable (AP) and accounts receivable (AR) management. Reduce errors and increase efficiency by leveraging artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning. Bill.com gets more intelligent as you use it, learning your processes and preferences to give you greater control over every aspect of bill management.

related_products.short_desc: Rental property and personal finances management solution with tenant information tracking, income management, and expense tracking.
related_products.features: Rental property and personal finances management solution with tenant information tracking, income management, and expense tracking.

related_products.short_desc: Forget late payments, gain full control of your process and start changing the reality of your Accounts Payable process with Pipefy.
related_products.features: Pipefy is a software that helps Financial teams to control Accounts Payable processes. Our solution is simpler and more organized than spreadsheets and emails, providing full visibility of each payment and establishing an error-proof workflow. More than 50,000 users are enhancing their results with Pipefy. Join them and improve the way you manage your accounts payable process today.

related_products.short_desc: Affordable, easy, yet powerful accounting for small business owners and their accountants. Streamline your money management.
related_products.features:
Voted most user-friendly and affordable accounting software by users! Patented double view accounting. Easy startup! Import data customers, vendors, trial balance, and Chart of Accounts.

Basic Accounting ($15/mo): Pay 1099s, create & mail invoices, record payments, track invoices auto-import bank transactions (most major banks supported), & accept credit cards. 

Premium Accounting ($25/mo)  All Basic features + estimates, reminders, recurring invoices, attach receipts, reconciliation & more

similar_products.short_desc: Corpay automates the payables process by consolidating all invoice payments into a single electronic workflow.
similar_products.features: Corpay is an AP automation solution for large enterprises that streamlines all invoice payments into a single workflow, across multiple locations, bank accounts, payment methods, and approval hierarchies. When its time for a payment run, you submit and approve payments in our software, then Corpay pays vendors according to their remit-to instructions and in their preferred method. We manage payment data for all your vendors and proactively reach out to resolve unprocessed payments.

similar_products.short_desc: Processes your vendor invoices electronically from capture and matching, to invoice approval and query management.
similar_products.features:
SoftCo AP Automation processes vendor invoices electronically from capture and matching, to invoice approval and query management. The solution manages all PO and non-PO vendor invoices. 

The dynamic matching engine handles 2-way, 3-way & Smart AI Matching, while automated approval workflows ensure that invoices are routed to the relevant approvers. The process of approving invoices is accelerated via on-the-go signoff by e-mail or the mobile app.

similar_products.short_desc: AvidXchange's AP automation solutions transform your invoice management process by eliminating paper and reducing processing costs.
similar_products.features: AvidXchange transforms how growing organizations pay bills by providing industry-leading AP and payment automation. We offer a combination of services and technology that helps you streamline your AP workflows and easily pay suppliers while removing manual tasks and paper from current processes. Our invoice-to-pay solution integrates with your existing financial accounting or ERP solution so you can automate your entire AP process without giving up control.

similar_products.short_desc: Automatically enter invoice data, route approvals, find any document and pay vendors from anywhere with Beanworks AP Automation.
similar_products.features: Beanworks empowers accounting teams to efficiently manage accounts payable from anywhere, without paper or manual follow-up. With AI-powered data entry and approval workflows for invoices, POs, payments and expenses, Beanworks provides 360 degree visibility and control for all things AP.

similar_products.short_desc: Streamline the processes to review, approve and pay invoices with NetSuite's cloud accounting software.
similar_products.features: NetSuite cloud accounting software automates the processing and payment of supplier invoices. Processes such as transaction matching, journal entries, approvals, and reconciliations are automated which means manual data entry is eliminated, and the time and effort required to process bills are minimized.  AP-specific dashboards, reports, and KPIs put you in control of your company's accounts payable process.

similar_products.short_desc: DocuPhase's end-to-end AP Automation and Vendor Payment solution helps finance teams automate the entire lifecycle of an invoice.
similar_products.features:
DocuPhase is an end-to-end AP Automation and Vendor Payment solution that automates the entire procure to pay process in one easy to use application.

DocuPhase is the only AP and Vendor Payment solution that completely automates the 3-way match process and works with your ERP of choice. Finance teams are able to automate how invoices are routed for approval and receive real-time status updates. 

Gain more time back in your day by completely automating your AP processes with DocuPhase.

similar_products.short_desc: With PayEm, centralize and simplify your accounts payable process. Introduce tech that offers control, flexibility, and visibility.
similar_products.features: Go beyond the same-old accounts payable process with PayEm. With us, companies will be able to accelerate their payment processs from beginning to end while reducing errors and workload. PayEm's platform will also allow you to seamlessly sync with your ERP or accounting software, so you'll never have to worry about manual inputs or double data entry. Moreover, approve funding requests in minutes across over 200 territories in 130 different currencies.

similar_products.short_desc: Bill.com is the intelligent business payments platform that delivers financial process efficiency, time savings, and full control.
similar_products.features: Bill.com delivers financial process efficiency through streamlined accounts payable (AP) and accounts receivable (AR) management. Reduce errors and increase efficiency by leveraging artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning. Bill.com gets more intelligent as you use it, learning your processes and preferences to give you greater control over every aspect of bill management.

similar_products.short_desc: Smart and simple spend management for scaling organizations. Verify, approve, and pay from within one platform with Procurify.
similar_products.features: Speed up purchasing and empower teams to buy what they need, when they need it, without the bottlenecks. The Procurify Platform lets your finance team verify, approve, and track your purchases in one easy-to-use platform that fully integrates with your existing accounting systems. Maximize operational efficiency and increase spend visibility and control with comprehensive procure-to-pay workflows, 3-way matching, and custom approvals.

similar_products.short_desc: Tipalti provides the only end-to-end accounts payables automation solution, streamlining the entire global supplier payments operation.
similar_products.features: Tipalti provides the only end-to-end accounts payables automation solution, eliminating 80% of the workload spent managing the entire global supplier payment operations. Tipalti's holistic cloud system includes supplier onboarding, tax form capture and validation, invoice processing, PO matching, payment method and currency selection, cross border remittance, early payments, supplier payment status communications, payment reconciliation, ERP integration, and tax filing preparation reporting.

similar_products.short_desc: SAP Concur takes you beyond automation to a completely connected spend management solution that grows with your business
similar_products.features: SAP Concur Invoice takes companies of all sizes and stages beyond automation to a completely connected spend management solution encompassing travel, expense, vendor invoice, compliance and risk. Our global expertise, industry-leading innovation and dynamic ecosystem of diverse partners and applications unlock powerful insights that help businesses reduce complexity and see spending clearly, so they can manage it proactively.

similar_products.short_desc: Order is a guided B2B marketplace with a mission to simplify buying for businesses. See growth from a new perspective with Order.
similar_products.features: Order (formerly Negotiatus) is a guided B2B marketplace with a mission to simplify buying for businesses. Order makes it easy for businesses to place and track purchases across all their vendors, control spend, and make all payments in a single, consolidated bill. Tailored insights and purchasing recommendations fuel smarter spending decisions so businesses can easily save time and money on what they need to grow.

similar_products.short_desc: Melio is a free AP software. No setup or monthly fees. Users pay with a bank transfer or a card. Vendors receive a check or a transfer.
similar_products.features:
Melio is a free Accounts Payable software that minimizes busywork and maximizes cash flow for US small businesses in all sectors. 
Simplify invoice payments - pay vendors, suppliers, and contractors using bank transfers for free or credit/debit cards even if they only accept checks! No monthly fee, no subscription costs. 

Accounts Payable re-invented. Melio automatically syncs with your QuickBooks and even mails checks on your behalf to vendors, so you don't need to cut checks anymore.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Accounting software automates an organization's financial functions and transactions with modules including accounts payable, accounts receivable, payroll, billing and general ledger. Integration of Accounting applications allows for comprehensive, real-time, on-demand analysis of an organization's financial status. Toolsets within Accounting solutions can often be customized to the specific needs of an organization. Accounting software is related to Audit software, Billing and Invoicing software, Compliance software and Financial Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Accounting Practice Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Accounting Practice Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Accounting Practice Management software helps professional accountants manage workflow, communicate with their clients, and automate their daily processes.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Accounts Receivable software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Accounts Receivable tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Accounts Receivable software deals with money that is owed to an organization. It automates the recording of payments on outstanding invoices and provides reports on collection and aging. Along with reports, Accounts Receivable applications generate monthly customer statements and collection letters. Accounts Receivable solutions integrate with Accounting software. Accounts Receivable software is related to Accounting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Billing and Invoicing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Billing and Invoicing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Billing and Invoicing software automates the process of producing and sending invoices and receiving payments. These applications enable the efficient processing of complex accounts across multiple customers and product lines, incorporating contract data and customer relationship management tools. Billing and Invoicing solutions are designed to work with accounting applications and provide a variety of business reporting tools. Billing and Invoicing software is related to Procurement software and Purchasing software.
